references.paper_title: Mtf-tailored multiscale fusion of high-resolution ms and pan imagery
references.reason: This paper is foundational for MTF-tailored multiscale fusion techniques in pansharpening, influencing many subsequent methods.

references.paper_title: Context-driven fusion of high spatial and spectral resolution images based on oversampled multiresolution analysis
references.reason: This paper introduces context-driven fusion for high spatial and spectral resolution images, significantly advancing the field of pansharpening.

references.paper_title: Pansharpening via detail injection based convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This work is among the first to apply deep learning to pansharpening, demonstrating the potential of CNNs in achieving improved results.
This seminal work introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a powerful generative technique used by the authors for pansharpening.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a low-rank adaptation technique that improves the performance of large language models, adopted by the authors for improving the efficiency of their pansharpening model.
